tool.name: Create lookup DB for whole protein filtering

param.name: input
param.label: FASTA database
param.help: Contains the protein sequences that will be used to create the lookup table

param.name: minlength
param.label: Minimum length of peptides that will be filtered

tool.help: Creates DB lookup from a FASTA sequence file. Lookup will contain all possible peptide sequences of certain length from all proteins in the DB
